title: Galaxy 6 Shoes
subtitle: Women's Running
description:
It was true then, and it's true now. adidas designs shoes with athletes in mind. These running shoes can be worn anytime, but they're still equipped with some innovative tech. The lightweight mesh upper lets air flow, and the Cloudfoam midsole gives a springy, cushioned feel. A soft sockliner keeps feet feeling supported, no matter how often you put them through a long walk or workout.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Breathable mesh upper; Textile lining; Cloudfoam midsole; OrthoLite® sockliner; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Dash Grey / Halo Silver / Silver Metallic; Product code: GW4133
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Core Black

title: Superstar Shoes
subtitle: Children Originals
description: When it comes to the adidas Superstar shoes, little to no introduction is needed. Started on the basketball court, made even more famous on hip-hop stages, found just about everywhere else after that… you know the story. Lace your kid into these rubber-shell-toe sneakers and have them join the legacy. They're all about carving your own path — evident from all the people and places they've found themselves on and in. So when kids step out in these shoes, they're joining the footsteps of all the game-changers and rule-breakers before them.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic upper; OrthoLite® sockliner; Textile lining; Rubber midsole and outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Beam Green; Product code: GW2171

title: Adipower Weightlifting 3 Shoes
subtitle: Weightlifting
description:
The ultimate platform for heavy lifting. These adidas weightlifting shoes keep you stable under the heaviest loads thanks to their raised heel and high-density midsole. That tough-as-nails canvas upper uses a lace-and-strap combo to keep you firmly locked in. The rubber outsole is specifically designed to plant your feet on the mat.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Durable canvas upper with hook-and-loop instep strap; Locked-down feel; High-density midsole; Low-profile grippy rubber outsole; Shoe weight: 466 g; Midsole drop: 22 mm (heel: 33 mm / forefoot: 11 mm); Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Linen Green / Cloud White / Beam Pink; Product code: GY8925
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Grey Three

title: Gazelle Shoes
subtitle: Originals
description: Ultimate simplicity for three decades and counting. This men's version of the Gazelle honors the favorite version of 1991, with the same materials, colors, textures and proportions as the original. The nubuck upper features contrast 3-Stripes and heel tab that echo the early-'90s style.
details: Nubuck upper; Synthetic overlays; Synthetic lining for comfort; Debossed Trefoil logo on tongue; Trefoil logo on heel tab; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Dgh Solid Grey / White / Gold Metallic; Product code: BB5480

title: NMD_V3 Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
Running-inspired style made for everyday exploration. These adidas NMD_V3 Shoes honor the cutting-edge design of the original '80s-inspired sneaker. The classic 3-Stripes, heel patch and sockliner all get global with "3 Stripe Life" printed in multiple languages. Textile materials add a comfortable touch while the BOOST midsole returns the energy you put into every step. A grippy rubber outsole helps you keep your footing on the slickest of city sidewalks.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Carbon; Product code: FZ5964
colors: Grey One / Off White / Halo Silver

title: Trae Young 2.0 Basketball Shoes
subtitle: Youth Basketball
description:
When the game is on the line, Trae Young ensures the ball finds his hands. These juniors' signature basketball shoes keep that fearless streak alive with the classic 3-Stripes that wrap around the forefoot. The sock-like fit hugs your feet to keep you comfortable. adidas BOOST on the heel combines with a Lightstrike midsole to give you a responsive feel with every move you make on the court.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; Lightstrike cushioning; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Core Black / Team Solar Green; Product code: H06486

description:
Find your rhythm in style with the adidas by Stella McCartney Earthlight shoes, which are every bit as functional as they are cool. 

The ideal choice for urban runs up to 10km, they feature a rubber outsole with a unique design grip, and have been tested to show optimum push forward support and a smooth roll off effect as you put in the miles. 

The airy mesh upper keeps things breathable as you put in the miles, and the stacked EVA midsole will support your every step. 

For maximum visual impact, pair them with other pieces from the adidas by Stella McCartney collection.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

Can't decide between retro and right-now? With the adidas Retropy, you get both. These juniors' shoes have a modern, pared-down look with pops of nostalgic style. Track-inspired styling gives them that casual, easy-to-wear vibe. A soft cushioned outsole will take you as far as you want to go.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g., cutting scraps and post-consumer household waste, to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper with suede and mesh overlays; OrthoLite® sockliner; EVA midsole; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White; Product code: GW3312
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

description: The Terrex Agravic Ultra has been created in close collaboration with one of the world's fastest ultra trail runners, Ekaterina Mityaeva. It is one of the first trail running shoes from adidas to feature a TPE bio-based plate that's made out of 90% renewable carbon.​The plate runs the entire length of the shoe for lightweight, durable rock protection over long-distance mountain trails.​ A blend of responsive BOOST and ultra-lightweight Lightstrike ensures high-energy return over mountainous terrain and cushions every stride to help you keep your pace over technical trails.​
details: Lace closure; Open mesh upper with abrasion-resistant weldings; Snug midfoot with slightly wider toe box; Lightstrike and BOOST midsole with carbon plate layer; Dual-layer Achilles protection and midsole rock protection plate; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Almost Lime / Turbo / Cloud White; Product code: H03180
colors: Bliss Lilac / Beam Orange / Pulse Magenta

description: Whether you're building consistency, upping your distance or training for a personal best, Solarglide 5 are the shoes you leave by the door to support your goals every single day. They're packed with performance technology, from the BOOST midsole to the knit upper and the adidas LEP 2.0. This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Circular knit textile upper; BOOST midsole; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Weight: 9.9 ounces; Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel: 36 mm / forefoot: 26 mm); adidas LEP 2.0; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Grey Six; Product code: GX5511
colors: Grey Two / Silver Metallic / Wonder Mauve

description:
Whether it's spin class at the gym or your smart trainer at home, indoor training demands dedicated shoes that manage the heat and sweat of cycling in place. The adidas Indoor Cycling Shoes are designed around high-intensity efforts. Their breathable, lightweight upper keeps feet cool with enhanced ventilation. A stiff, full-length midsole insert transfers power for efficient pedalling. The hook-and-loop closure locks in your foot and makes for easy on and off. Go ahead and set that PR.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Hook-and-loop strap closure; Breathable textile upper with ventilation zones; Lightweight feel; Synthetic lining; Fiberglass-reinforced nylon midsole plate; Three-bolt cleat compatibility; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Turbo / Cloud White / Acid Red; Product code: GZ6343
colors: Linen Green / Core Black / Beam Yellow

description:
The classic and sleek silhouette that made the adidas Superstar sneaker so iconic gets a fun update with these juniors' shoes. The colorful heel tab celebrates this adidas and LEGO Group partnership with a LEGO® brick design, and hook-and-loop closures make them easy to slip on and off during your next adventure. The super soft sockliner ensures maximum comfort.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic leather upper; OrthoLite® sockliner; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Core Black / Pantone; Product code: GV8885

description:
Any time you're on your feet is a good time to wear the adidas Ultraboost. These juniors' shoes pack all the performance techs that runners love into a design you'll want to wear outside of gym class. Beyond looks, its superpower is comfort – from the soft feel of the adidas PRIMEKNIT upper to the incredible energy return of BOOST.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT upper; BOOST midsole; Torsion System; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Shadow Green / Impact Orange / Core Black; Product code: HR1796
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Beam Pink
